'''No-Nut Ned''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A simple merchant serving the pirates of Fort Deadlight.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Weapons, armor, and adventuring gear. Unique items include [The Bloody Links](/theBloodyLinks/).
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* If you killed [Benweth](/benweth/) during [Blow the Man Down](/blowTheManDown/), he says:
:''"You've got a spot of blood on your... actually, never mind."'
}}

## Gallery

<gallery>
Portrait No-Nut Ned Convo.png|Interestingly, he seems to have been an orlan originally
</gallery>
